mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (userid, o_name, p_id, amount) VALUES (#{userid}, #{o_name}, #{p_id},#{amount})
mapper.select: select c.c_id, p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_img1, p.p_price, c.amount,c.o_name, p_price*amount money from member m, cart c, product p where m.userid=c.userid and c.p_id=p.p_id and c.userid=#{userid} order by c_id
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where c_id=#{c_id}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(p.p_price * c.amount), 0) AS money FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.p_id = p.p_id WHERE c.userid = #{userid}
